thread.title: GoMedia Canada: Welcome to British Columbia’s Okanagan Valley [Photos]
thread.title_full: GoMedia Canada: Welcome to British Columbia’s Okanagan Valley [Photos]

title: GoMedia Canada: Welcome to British Columbia’s Okanagan Valley [Photos]
text:
Report an error 
Majestic mountains dotted with evergreens, lush vineyards surrounding stately wineries and a 135-km-long blue lake that stretches from Vernon in the north to Penticton in the south... this is British Columbia's Okanagan Valley, the host site of the Canadian Tourism Commission 's annual GoMedia travel conference. 
More than 155 Canadian and international travel writers will be descending on Penticton for the next four days to discover the best food, wine and tourism the Okanagan Valley has to offer. 
I'll be discovering the origins of the Valley two ways: from high in the sky on a helicopter tour and from the rails on a historic journey aboard the Kettle Valley Steam Railway. I'll also be meeting with representatives from different destinations across Canada to discover the new attractions travellers will want to discover from coast-to-coast. 
Get live updates from the Okanagan Valley on Twitter by following @canoetravel and check back with blogs.canoe.com/travel for the latest on what's new and exciting in travel across Canada this year. Sponsored Links
